description: Episode of Series "Single Concept Drug Films". This film shows alcohol as a mood changing substance. It shows the effects of different levels of alcohol consumption, which can lead to coma and death in extreme cases. The film stresses that decisions to use alcohol are best left to the informed individual. Suitable for secondary and tertiary levels.
